title: Safety Vest

version.description: Unicode 12.0 was released on March 5, 2019. Emojis that require new code points for release are listed on this page. See Emoji 12.0 for the full 2019 emoji list. More about this update.

apple_vendor_description: The safety vest emoji on Apple devices is rendered in a vibrant, fluorescent orange, immediately catching the eye with its high visibility.  Its design features subtle, realistic lighting that accentuates the textured material and reflective strips, showcasing Apple's commitment to detail.  On Apple devices, this emoji conveys a sense of protection, caution, and the importance of safety protocols.
